Wishlist

These are the things I want to get at some point. Some of things I expect to buy myself, some of them are things I probably wouldn't spend the money on but would be great as a gift.

Don't know what to buy me for Christmas? Anything labelled Gift idea are things I am unlikely to buy myself any time soon.
